languages.text: "От лица Инквизиции я объявляю запрет на любые контакты с данным устройством. Оно должно быть изъято и передано нашим аколитам. Тут я мог бы умолкнуть, но из уважения к тебе скажу то, что не обязан. Инквизиция может... извлечь пользу из этой еретической техники. Подготовленные аколиты способны нести бдение возле нее, осторожно подслушивая темные шепоты духов Имматериума и не впадая в скверну. Мы могли бы открыть их планы... и предупредить Вольного Торговца, когда угроза нависнет над его владениями ".

"On behalf of the Inquisition, I hereby declare a ban on any contact with this device. It must be removed and given to our acolytes. Normally that would be all, but I will explain further — out of respect for you. The Inquisition can... reap benefits from this heretical machine. Our trained acolytes are able to carry a vigil near it, carefully listening to the dark whispers of the spirits of the Immaterium without succumbing to their corruption. We could discover their plans... and warn the Rogue Trader whenever any threat would loom over {mf|his|her} domain."
languages.original_text: "От лица Инквизиции я объявляю запрет на любые контакты с данным устройством. Оно должно быть изъято и передано нашим аколитам. Тут я мог бы умолкнуть, но из уважения к тебе скажу то, что не обязан. Инквизиция может... извлечь пользу из этой еретической техники. Мы могли бы открыть их планы... и предупредить Вольного Торговца, когда угроза нависнет над его владениями ".

traits.locale_text: "On behalf of the Inquisition, I hereby declare a ban on any contact with this device. It must be removed and given to our acolytes.We would be done here, but I am going to say something I do not have to — out of respect for you . The Inquisition can...reap benefits from this heretical machine. Our trained acolytes are able to carry a vigil near it, carefully listening to the dark whispers of the spirits of the Immaterium without succumbing to corruption. We could discover their plans... and warn the Rogue Trader whenever the threat would loom over {mf|his|her}."

languages.text: “我代表审判庭，特此宣布，禁止与此装置进行任何形式的接触。必须将其拆除，交给我们的侍仆，之后这件事情就到此为止了。不过，出于对你的尊重，我打算告诉你我本无需透露的事情。审判庭可以……使用这台异端机器，从而获得优势。我们训练有素的侍仆会在它附近守夜，仔细聆听亚空间灵魂的黑暗低语，而又不至于被腐化侵染。我们可以发现敌人的计划……在威胁迫近时警告行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the Inquisition, I hereby declare a ban on any contact with this device. It must be removed and given to our acolytes. Normally that would be all, but I will explain further — out of respect for you. The Inquisition can... reap benefits from this heretical machine. Our trained acolytes are able to carry a vigil near it, carefully listening to the dark whispers of the spirits of the Immaterium without succumbing to their corruption. We could discover their plans... and warn the Rogue Trader whenever any threat would loom over {mf|his|her} domain."

traits.locale_text: “我代表审判庭，特此宣布，禁止与此装置进行任何形式的接触。必须将其拆除，交给我们的侍仆，之后这件事情就到此为止了。不过，出于对你的尊重，我打算告诉你我本无需透露的事情。审判庭可以……使用这台异端机器，从而获得优势。我们训练有素的侍仆会在它附近守夜，仔细聆听亚空间灵魂的黑暗低语，而又不至于被腐化侵染。我们可以发现敌人的计划……在威胁迫近时警告行商浪人。”

languages.text: «En nombre de la Inquisición, por la presente declaro la prohibición de cualquier contacto con este dispositivo. Debe ser retirado y entregado a nuestros acólitos. Normalmente, eso sería todo, pero voy a explicarme más por respeto a usted. La Inquisición puede... sacar beneficios de esta máquina herética. Nuestros acólitos entrenados son capaces de llevar una vigilia cerca de ella, escuchando cuidadosamente los oscuros susurros de los espíritus del Inmaterio sin sucumbir a su corrupción. Podríamos descubrir sus planes... y avisar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente cada vez que alguna amenaza se cerniera sobre su dominio».
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the Inquisition, I hereby declare a ban on any contact with this device. It must be removed and given to our acolytes. Normally that would be all, but I will explain further — out of respect for you. The Inquisition can... reap benefits from this heretical machine. Our trained acolytes are able to carry a vigil near it, carefully listening to the dark whispers of the spirits of the Immaterium without succumbing to their corruption. We could discover their plans... and warn the Rogue Trader whenever any threat would loom over {mf|his|her} domain."

traits.locale_text: «En nombre de la Inquisición, por la presente declaro la prohibición de cualquier contacto con este dispositivo. Debe ser retirado y entregado a nuestros acólitos. Normalmente, eso sería todo, pero voy a explicarme más por respeto a usted. La Inquisición puede... sacar beneficios de esta máquina herética. Nuestros acólitos entrenados son capaces de llevar una vigilia cerca de ella, escuchando cuidadosamente los oscuros susurros de los espíritus del Inmaterio sin sucumbir a su corrupción. Podríamos descubrir sus planes... y avisar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente cada vez que alguna amenaza se cerniera sobre su dominio».

languages.text: 「異端審問庁を代表し、この装置との接触を禁止する。それを撤去し、我々のアコライトに渡すのだ。通常であればこれで終わりだが、あなたへの敬意を表して、さらに説明を加えるとしよう...異端審問庁は...この異端の機械からメリットを享受することができるのだ。我々の訓練されたアコライトなら、その近くで寝ずの番をして、非物質世界の精霊の腐敗に侵されることなく、その闇の囁き声に注意深く耳を傾けることができる。奴らの計画を暴きだし...ローグトレーダーの領地に脅威が迫るたびに、それを警告することができるのだ」
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the Inquisition, I hereby declare a ban on any contact with this device. It must be removed and given to our acolytes. Normally that would be all, but I will explain further — out of respect for you. The Inquisition can... reap benefits from this heretical machine. Our trained acolytes are able to carry a vigil near it, carefully listening to the dark whispers of the spirits of the Immaterium without succumbing to their corruption. We could discover their plans... and warn the Rogue Trader whenever any threat would loom over {mf|his|her} domain."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁を代表し、この装置との接触を禁止する。それを撤去し、我々のアコライトに渡すのだ。通常であればこれで終わりだが、あなたへの敬意を表して、さらに説明を加えるとしよう...異端審問庁は...この異端の機械からメリットを享受することができるのだ。我々の訓練されたアコライトなら、その近くで寝ずの番をして、非物質世界の精霊の腐敗に侵されることなく、その闇の囁き声に注意深く耳を傾けることができる。奴らの計画を暴きだし...ローグトレーダーの領地に脅威が迫るたびに、それを警告することができるのだ」

languages.text: « Au nom de l'Inquisition, je frappe d'interdiction tout contact avec cet appareil. Il devra être emporté et remis à nos acolytes. En temps normal, cette injonction se suffirait à elle-même, mais je tiens à m'expliquer... ne serait-ce que par respect pour vous. L'Inquisition pourrait... tirer profit de cette machine hérétique. Des acolytes spécialement formés veilleront constamment sur elle, écoutant les sombres murmures des esprits de l'Immaterium sans risquer de succomber à leur corruption. Cela nous permettrait de découvrir leurs plans à l'avance... et d'avertir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} chaque fois qu'une menace viendra planer sur son domaine. »
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the Inquisition, I hereby declare a ban on any contact with this device. It must be removed and given to our acolytes. Normally that would be all, but I will explain further — out of respect for you. The Inquisition can... reap benefits from this heretical machine. Our trained acolytes are able to carry a vigil near it, carefully listening to the dark whispers of the spirits of the Immaterium without succumbing to their corruption. We could discover their plans... and warn the Rogue Trader whenever any threat would loom over {mf|his|her} domain."

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de l'Inquisition, je frappe d'interdiction tout contact avec cet appareil. Il devra être emporté et remis à nos acolytes. En temps normal, cette injonction se suffirait à elle-même, mais je tiens à m'expliquer... ne serait-ce que par respect pour vous. L'Inquisition pourrait... tirer profit de cette machine hérétique. Des acolytes spécialement formés veilleront constamment sur elle, écoutant les sombres murmures des esprits de l'Immaterium sans risquer de succomber à leur corruption. Cela nous permettrait de découvrir leurs plans à l'avance... et d'avertir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} chaque fois qu'une menace viendra planer sur son domaine. »

languages.text: "Im Namen der Inquisition erkläre ich hiermit jeden Kontakt mit diesem Gerät für verboten. Es muss entfernt und unseren Akolythen übergeben werden. Für gewöhnlich wäre das alles, doch ich erkläre es noch weiter — aus Respekt vor Euch. Die Inquisition kann ... Vorteile aus dieser ketzerischen Maschine ziehen. Unsere ausgebildeten Akolythen können in ihrer Nähe eine Mahnwache abhalten und genau auf das dunkle Flüstern der Geister des Immateriums lauschen, ohne ihrer Verderbnis anheim zu fallen. Wir könnten in Erfahrung bringen, was sie planen ... und {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} warnen, wann immer {mf|seinem|ihrem} Reich Gefahr droht."
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the Inquisition, I hereby declare a ban on any contact with this device. It must be removed and given to our acolytes. Normally that would be all, but I will explain further — out of respect for you. The Inquisition can... reap benefits from this heretical machine. languages.text: "Engizisyon namına bu cihazla herhangi bir temasın gerçekleştirilmesini yasaklıyorum. Derhâl havarilerimize teslim edilmeli. Aslında bu söylediklerim kâfi olurdu ama duyduğum saygıdan ötürü teferruatıyla izah edeyim. Engizisyon... Bu kâfir icadından yararlanabilir. Talimli havarilerimiz, cihazın başında bekleyerek Tindiyar'ın ruhlarına kulak verme ve yozluğun pençesine düşmeden meşum fısıltılarını dikkatle dinleme kabiliyetine sahiptir. Planlarını açığa çıkarabilir ve... Hür Tacir Hazretleri'nin mülküne karşı herhangi bir tehdit oluşması hâlinde uyarıda bulunabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the Inquisition, I hereby declare a ban on any contact with this device. It must be removed and given to our acolytes. Normally that would be all, but I will explain further — out of respect for you. The Inquisition can... reap benefits from this heretical machine. Our trained acolytes are able to carry a vigil near it, carefully listening to the dark whispers of the spirits of the Immaterium without succumbing to their corruption. We could discover their plans... and warn the Rogue Trader whenever any threat would loom over {mf|his|her} domain."
